verses.verse: And Abraham <S%H85><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from there <S%H8033><s%> toward the south <S%H5045><s%> country, <S%H776><s%> and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Kadesh <S%H6946><s%> and Shur, <S%H7793><s%> and sojourned <S%H1481><s%> in Gerar. <S%H1642><s%>

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> of Sarah <S%H8283><s%> his wife, <S%H802><s%> She is my sister: <S%H269><s%> and Abimelech <S%H40><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Gerar <S%H1642><s%> sent, <S%H7971><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> Sarah. <S%H8283><s%>

But God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Abimelech <S%H40><s%> in a dream <S%H2472><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, Behold, <S%H2009><s%> you are but a dead <S%H4191><s%> man, for the woman <S%H802><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have taken; <S%H3947><s%> for she is a man's <S%H1167><s%> wife. <S%H1166><s%>

But Abimelech <S%H40><s%> had not come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> her: and he said, <S%H559><s%> LORD, <S%H136><s%> will you slay <S%H2026><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> a righteous <S%H6662><s%> nation? <S%H1471><s%>

Said <S%H559><s%> he not to me, She is my sister? <S%H269><s%> and she, even <S%H1571><s%> she herself said, <S%H559><s%> He is my brother: <S%H251><s%> in the integrity <S%H8537><s%> of my heart <S%H3824><s%> and innocence <S%H5356><s%> of my hands <S%H3709><s%> have I done <S%H6213><s%> this. <S%H2063><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him in a dream, <S%H2472><s%> Yes, <S%H1571><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that you did <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> in the integrity <S%H8537><s%> of your heart; <S%H3824><s%> for I also <S%H1571><s%> withheld <S%H2820><s%> you from sinning <S%H2398><s%> against me: therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> suffered <S%H5414><s%> I you not to touch <S%H5060><s%> her.

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore restore <S%H7725><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> his wife; <S%H802><s%> for he is a prophet, <S%H5030><s%> and he shall pray <S%H6419><s%> for you, and you shall live: <S%H2421><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> you restore <S%H7725><s%> her not, know <S%H3045><s%> you that you shall surely <S%H3588><s%> die, <S%H4191><s%> you, and all <S%H3605><s%> that are yours.

Therefore Abimelech <S%H40><s%> rose <S%H7925><s%> early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and told <S%H1696><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> in their ears: <S%H241><s%> and the men <S%H582><s%> were sore <S%H3966><s%> afraid. <S%H3372><s%>

Then Abimelech <S%H40><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, What <S%H4100><s%> have you done <S%H6213><s%> to us? and what <S%H4100><s%> have I offended <S%H2398><s%> you, that you have brought <S%H935><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> me and on <S%H5921><s%> my kingdom <S%H4467><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> sin? <S%H2401><s%> you have done <S%H6213><s%> deeds <S%H4639><s%> to me that ought not to be done. <S%H6213><s%>
And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> you, that you have done <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing? <S%H1697><s%>

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> I thought, <S%H559><s%> Surely <S%H7535><s%> the fear <S%H3374><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> is not in this <S%H2088><s%> place; <S%H4725><s%> and they will slay <S%H2026><s%> me for my wife's <S%H802><s%> sake. <S%H1697><s%>

And yet <S%H1571><s%> indeed <S%H546><s%> she is my sister; <S%H269><s%> she is the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of my father, <S%H1><s%> but not the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of my mother; <S%H517><s%> and she became <S%H1961><s%> my wife. <S%H802><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> caused me to wander <S%H8582><s%> from my father's <S%H1><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> that I said <S%H559><s%> to her, This <S%H2088><s%> is your kindness <S%H2617><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall show <S%H6213><s%> to me; at <S%H413><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> we shall come, <S%H935><s%> say <S%H559><s%> of me, He is my brother. <S%H251><s%>

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and oxen, <S%H1241><s%> and menservants, <S%H5650><s%> and womenservants, <S%H8198><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> and restored <S%H7725><s%> him Sarah <S%H8283><s%> his wife. <S%H802><s%>
And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> my land <S%H776><s%> is before <S%H6440><s%> you: dwell <S%H3427><s%> where it pleases <S%H2896><s%> <S%H5869><s%> you.

And to Sarah <S%H8283><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> pieces of silver: <S%H3701><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> he is to you a covering <S%H3682><s%> of the eyes, <S%H5869><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> that are with you, and with all <S%H3605><s%> other: thus she was reproved. <S%H3198><s%>

So Abraham <S%H85><s%> prayed <S%H6419><s%> to God: <S%H430><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> healed <S%H7495><s%> Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> and his wife, <S%H802><s%> and his maidservants; <S%H519><s%> and they bore <S%H3205><s%> children.

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had fast closed <S%H6113><s%> up all <S%H3605><s%> the wombs <S%H7358><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1697><s%> of Sarah <S%H8283><s%> Abraham's <S%H85><s%> wife. <S%H802><s%>
